readable.title: 3411393875_a9ff73c67a
readable.content: A man in a red shirt standing next to a woman in a black shirt with a car in the background . A man in a red shirt that says ' Espana ' and a girl with purple streaks in her hair are smiling . A man with a red Spain shirt and a woman with purple streaks in her hair . The man and lady pose for a picture . The man is wearing a red shirt , while the woman standing with him has purple streaks in her hair .
